description:
The Redz member Derek Pain rides his motorcycle in the middle of the night. When a citizen yells for help, Derek comes to the rescue. He falls for the Onyx member Josh West's evil trap. Josh throws the helpless Derek on the chain web and punches the hell out of him. Josh taunts the Redz for their sensual bondage ways. He ties Derek to his motorcycle and rigs it to fuck the bound muscle stud's ass. After some more beating, Josh takes Derek to the Onyx lair for the first time. Has Josh converted Derek into an Onyx or is Derek just going along with it, waiting for the perfect time to escape?
History of The Onyx and The Redz: Late at night when the city sleeps, the Onyx and the Redz begin their day. For a long time, these tribes have been at odds with each other. The Onyx is a wild bunch that loves to engage their victims in bondage games and nasty corporal punishment. On the other hand, the Redz is a peaceful tribe that enjoys bondage play only for the sensual aspect. Is the city big enough for both or must one tribe go?
title: Onyx and Redz Once More
